title: IANA Considerations for Internet Group Management Protocols
abstract:
This document specifies revised IANA considerations for the Internet
Group Management Protocol (IGMP) and the Multicast Listener Discovery
(MLD) protocol. This document specifies the guidance provided to IANA
to manage values associated with various fields within the protocol
headers of the group management protocols.

This document obsoletes RFC 3228 and unifies guidelines for IPv4 and
IPv6 group management protocols.
